name: learn.python
description: A comprehensive Python curriculum from zero tech experience to world-class full-stack mastery. 50+ sequenced documents, 246 hands-on projects across 13 levels, 56 expansion module projects across 12 technology domains.

hasCourseInstance.name: Level 00 — Absolute Beginner
hasCourseInstance.description: First steps with Python. No imports, no tests. Print statements, variables, input, basic math, simple string operations.

hasCourseInstance.name: Level 0 — Terminal and Files
hasCourseInstance.description: Terminal usage, file reading/writing, basic I/O, string manipulation, simple menus.

hasCourseInstance.name: Level 1 — Input Validation and Data Formats
hasCourseInstance.description: Input validation, CSV and JSON handling, date operations, file paths, basic automation.

hasCourseInstance.name: Level 2 — Data Structures and Error Handling
hasCourseInstance.description: Dictionaries, nested data, error handling, data cleaning, config-driven programs, retry patterns.

hasCourseInstance.name: Level 3 — Packages, Logging, and TDD
hasCourseInstance.description: Package layout, CLI arguments, logging, test-driven development, refactoring, structured error handling.

hasCourseInstance.name: Level 4 — Schema Validation and Pipelines
hasCourseInstance.description: Schema validation, data contracts, transformation pipelines, backup tools, checkpoint recovery.

hasCourseInstance.name: Level 5 — Scheduling, Monitoring, Resilience
hasCourseInstance.description: Task scheduling, health monitoring, retry with backoff, circuit breakers, alerting systems.

hasCourseInstance.name: Level 6 — SQL and ETL
hasCourseInstance.description: SQL fundamentals, staging tables, ETL pipelines, idempotent operations, incremental loads.

hasCourseInstance.name: Level 7 — APIs, Caching, Observability
hasCourseInstance.description: API adapters, caching strategies, polling, webhook simulation, ingestion observability.

hasCourseInstance.name: Level 8 — Dashboards and Concurrency
hasCourseInstance.description: Dashboard building, concurrent processing, fault injection, performance testing, data visualization.

hasCourseInstance.name: Level 9 — Architecture and SLOs
hasCourseInstance.description: System architecture, SLO definition, capacity planning, security auditing, reliability scorecards.

hasCourseInstance.name: Level 10 — Enterprise Engineering
hasCourseInstance.description: Enterprise blueprints, compliance, multi-tenant systems, zero-downtime migrations, production readiness.

hasCourseInstance.name: Elite Track
hasCourseInstance.description: Algorithms, distributed systems, event-driven architecture, observability platforms, staff-engineer capstone.
